div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem quarto die Decembris
anno quosupra

The samyn day Jonhne of hile one that ane part Ande margaret hile his
douchtir with consent ande assent of Alexander lame hir spous' was oblist be the fathtis in
thar' bodiis to stande at the ordinance and deliuerance of Alexander rede Androw cullan
and Dauid Kintor anent ale gudis debatable' betuix thame and anent the land clamit
be the said margaret And the said personis sal giffurtht thar deliuerance tharanent
be sonday cum aucht dais

Curia balliuorum legalis tenta in pretorio per balliuos xo die Decembris anno
quo supra

the samyn day it was fundin ande deliuerit be the court that Dauid michel
sone sal pay to patrik cler baxtar xviij s' of Siluer quhilk the ballieis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die Johannes colisone super quem alexander chamer porrexit plegium pro rele
uacione suj de comodo piscarie dimidii Rethis de Raik anno elapso aut anno instante
vt in quodam acto precedente plenius continetur vocatus non comparuit quare precipitur
thome Jameson seriando ad capiendum districtum a dicto Johanne et premunire eum
ad proximam Curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xijo die Decembris Anno quo supra

the quhilk
day Androw Culane eldar grantit him avande to Jonhne Wormet j barrele
of salmond' ful rede ande suet merchand gude of the Richtuis' mesour' of the
saide burghe' to be pait lelelie and treulie at lammes next to cum but fraude
and gile
thareftir the said Jonhne Wormet grantit him pait of the said barrel of Salmond
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xiij die Decembris vt supra

The samyn day it was fundin ande deliuerit be ane assise Alexander rede forspekar
that mastir theman crab sal fulfill ale thingis contenit in his obligacion maide
to William blinsele writin with the said mastir themannis hande

Eodem die prepositus et ballivi limitarunt prefixerunt et assignarunt octauum
diem Januarij proxime futurum Alexandro matheson ad faciendum aut negandum xviij
l' clamatas per Agnetem colp et margaretam colp et faciendum quod Jura voluit
secundum exigenciam breuis conuencionis capelle regis sibi desuper direct'

the samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assis Alexander rede forspekar that perhandebow
sal bring his cownt buk with him agan god willing at his next rays' to beir'
witnes how mekile fraucht he tuk fra thome hatmakar And falyeing' tharof he sale
pay to the saide thomas alsmekile money as he can preif that he tuk fra him atour
vj s' g'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio xiijo die Decembris anno
quosupra

Eodem die Repertum fuit quod magister themannus crab est quitus
de clameo Willelmi blinsele de vno annuo Redditu x s' clamat' de terra Johannis
fechat Jacente in vico nauium et dictus magister themannus ostendit suam possessionem de
eodem et certis aliis redditibus et terris

Eodem die prepositus ballivi et diuersi communitatis et consilii referebant debatas inter
Richardum boile et Andream coupar penes le clerkschip decisionj curati
et capellanorum collegij de Abirdene
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xv die Decembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day Alexander of mar oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to pay to thomas
prat alevin pundis and sex s' vsuale money of Scotlande be candilmes next to cum
And falyeing' tharof to gif him beire for xii s' the boll extending to the said Some
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxij die Decembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day Alexander chamer and laurence deyf deponeit be thar aithis that the
saide Alexander maide vi s' and ii d' of costis vpone Dauid gallichtleis oxe
the quhilk the saide Dauid sal pay to the saide Alexander togiddir with vj s'
for the said' Dauidis vnlaw and this being' pait he sal deliuer the said oxe
be this day or the sone gaing to and falyeing' he pait nocht the said xij s'
and ij d' or the sone gang to the said Alexander sal Jois' the samyn oxe as
suorne prisaris prisit him and salbe quyt of the said Dauidis clame tharanent
in tyme to cum

The samyn day the aldirman ballieis and ane part of consale and communite
gathtreit be the warning of the bele grantit that Robert huchouson'
sale haue alsmekile fee for' his continuale gude seruice to be maid this
yer as he hede and was promittit to him the yer' bigan nay man
present saiande in contrar

Eodem die matheus toschow conuictus per assisam pro perturbio georgei Dys'
et ad emendandum ei ut iura volunt

Eodem die matheus toschow inuenit Johannem mar' plegium legalem quod geor
gius Dys' et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam
per viam iuris Et Idem georgius inuenit Johannem colison plegium legalem quod
dictus matheus et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro eo et parte sua aliter quam per
viam Juris et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suum plegium Indem
pnem

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxiiij die
Decembris Anno quo supra

quo die Johannes colison vocatus ad respondendum
plegio super ipsum perlecto per alexandrum de camera pro releuacione sui piscarie
dimidii Rethis de Raik et cetera ut in acto prius confecto plenius continuetur non comparuit
quare precipitur thome Jameson' seriando ad capiendum vnum districtum a dicto
Johanne et premunire eum ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam tercium die huius
processus

Eodem die Alexander chavmer patronus / et dominus Johannes striuelin' capellanus altaris sancte
Katerine / in ecclesia beati nicholai In alienacione cuiusdam annui Redditus Nouem solidorum
exeunt' annuatim et leuand' / de terre thome quhite / Ricardo hill / seniori protestati
fuerunt quod dicta alienacio annui Redditus predicti capellano et altari predictis
penes annuum Redditum / sex solidorum et octo denariorum de fundo dicte terre non
cederet in preiudicium /

Eodem die Alexander de camera deuenit plegius ad intrandum margaretam bal
cromy coram preposito ballivis et consulibus in Curia capitali proxima futura
post festum natiuitatis Domini pro emenda facienda pro disponacione et inobediencia
thome Jameson seriandi in execucione sui officij per confessionem proprie lingue

Eodem die Dauid galichtlie obligauit se per manum et bona ad comparendum
coram preposito et ballivis in Curia capitali proxime futura ad eundem super
hiis que ipsi contra ipsum obicere habent

Eodem die Isabella quhit sponsa thome quhit magnum corporale
prestitit Juramentum sacrosanctis ewangeliis nominatis quod spontane voluntate consentit
alienacionj vnius annuj redditus nomine solidorum per dictum sponsum suum factum
Richardo hile quamquidem alienacionem nunquam reuocaret in postrum sub pena
omnium bonorum suorum periuruusque periuriusque et infamie et si renocare contigerit quod absit
do eandem vendicionem et alienacionem approbat et ratificat tociens
quociens omnibus fraude et dolo semotis

Curia capitalis de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos
duodecimo die Januarij Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo octauo
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes pacent in Rotulo secte

The samyn day the aldirman ballieis consale ande communite gathtreit for the tyme committit
to gif Robert huchonsone sangstar and mastir of the organis alsmekile fee as that gaf
him this yer' bigan for this yeris seruice to be maid deuly as efferis

Eodem die dominus Alexander Vocat capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Niniani accedens ad barram
protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu vj s' et octo d' sibj et dicto altari debit' de quadam
terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in le gastrav inter terram hered' quondam andree baxtar ex australi
et terram Johannis myle ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos in sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo
moire Juniore Johanne rogersone seriandoque Duncano straloche

Eodem die dominus matheus nichilson capellanus ac procurator altaris Beati petri Apostoli
accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex s' sibi et dicto altari
debit' de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in le gastraw inter terram hered' quondam
Andree baxtar ex australi et terram Johannis myle ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo presentavit in curia ballivis tanquam
secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo moire Juniore Johanne rogersone et Duncano straloche
seriando

Eodem die magister Andreas cadiow accedens ad barram protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo redditu vi s' et viij d' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra Jacente
in le hukstarraw inter terram Dauid hile ex orientali et terram patricij coupar ex occidentali
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo
balliuis presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Andrea ancroft Johanne
mvnk et moricio byssat seriando

Eodem die dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaici accedens ad barram
protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi et dicto altari annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome mar ex australi
et terram thome prat ex orientali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos in sacculo balliuis presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
testibus Willelmo moire Juniore Johanne Rogerson et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid murray et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu duorum s'
sibi debit' de quodam orto wasto Jacente extra le bowbrig ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos in sacculo ballivis presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Jacobo
Willelmo philp et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum Johannem stirueling capellanum capelle
beate Katerine virginis dominum Alexandrum vocat procuratorem capellanorum colegij de Abirdene
et Willelmum futhes super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste
Jacentis in vico Nauium inter terram quondam Duncani byrs' ex australi et terram henrici
forbes ex boreali in defectu solucionis quorundam annuorum reddituum sibi annuatim debit'
et a longo tempore non solut' vnde dicti dominus Johannes dominus Alexander et Willelmus pecierunt
a ballivis secundum formam sui processus precedentis iuris et iusticie complementum Tunc curia
auisiat' decreuit quod dicti capellanj et Willelmus possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre legittime
recuperauerunt pro defectu solucionis annuorum reddituum infrascriptorum et hoc ex ore
Johannis tailyour Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio fuit datum teste Curia

Eodem die dominus Johannes ruthirfurde allegauit se probaturum terram per processus
prosecutam per dominum matheum nicholson distringibilem pro annuo Redditu xx s' infra
tempus huiusmodi processus Cuj prepositus et ballivi assignarunt primum diem lune quadra
gesime hoc proband' et premunierunt vtramque partem in premissis

The fiftene day of Januar' the yer of gode et cetera auchty and aucht yeris thir personis vndir
writin that is to say Wat auchneywe Williame futhes Jonhne grige Robert crage and Robert
of buchan to giddir with certane craftismen that is to say James Kennarty William gold
smitht Williame ranison James crage cristy prat and thome gardinar was chosin and
suorne taxtouris be the aldirman ballieis consale and communite of abirdene to extent and taxt
jc lib' tile ane honorabile ambaxat to pas' in vthir regionis for ane nobile principes tile
our Souerane lord eftir the tenor of our Souerane lordis lettres direct tharapone And to extent
tuelf pundis aucht to Robert huchonson' of his fee for his playing' of the organis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xixo die Januarij Anno Domini et cetera lxxxviij

Eodem die Willelmus clerk fecit constituit creauit et ordinavit Alexandrum chamer de murchile et
Andream culane coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores ad petendum et recipiendum a Johanne
Sthevinson quinque marcas et quinque s' sibi debit' et de receptis acquitandis Et si necesse
fuerit dictum Johannem coram quocumque Judice competen' prosequend' et calumpniand' promittens se Rato
gratoque et cetera in vberiore forma procuratorij cum omnibus clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The samyn day the wyf of Jonhne fechat eldar grantit hir avand to thome menyes
ix s' and ij d' for Androu ramsay the maltman the quhilk the balyeis chargit
hir to pay him within terme of law

the samyn day James leslie one that ane part Ande Dauid symsone one that vthir part was
oblist and bundin be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand and abid at the ordinance decret and
deliuerance of thir personis vndir writin that is to say Alexander chamer of murchile Jonhne
colison Dauid menyeis eldar Robert blinsele Alexander Red and thomas prat summisouris
and amicabile compositouris chosin be the said partiis anent the outquiting' of the Inland
liande in the castalgate that was the said Dauidis menyeis and anent ale debatis and controuersiis
debatabile betuix the said partiis tharanent quhilk sex personis salbe suorne the gret
aith' tharto And sal giffurtht begyne and tak the said matir to thame one sonday at
next cumis within the gray freris of Abirdene And salffurtht gif thar' sentence and decret
be candilmesevin that next cumis And' thai sal haue pouer to cheis' tham ane ode
persone at thar avne plesance gif neide be to sytt with thame tharapon'

the samyn day it was statut and ordanit be the ballieis and diuers' of the consel that the
baxteris sal bak twa penny bred xviij vnce of weilbakin bred for ij d' And
nay four penny brede nor bannokis vndir the pane of eschet tharof and ane vnlaw

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxiij die Januarij anno
quo supra

In the ewin quartar Williame spruty and Jonhne covys was suorne cun
naris chosin for this yer in the said quartar to pas' with thom morice byssat
officiar of the samyn Ilkan oulk at the lest anys and to set it eftir thar knalege'

In the crukit quartar
George of Dys ande Williame belty was chosin and suorne cunnaris to
pas' with Duncan straloche officar' of the samyn quartar

In the grene quartar
Williame Ray and Williame cuming' was chosin and suorne cunnaris to pas'
witht thomas Jamesone seriand of the samyn quartar

In futy quartar
Thome narne and patrik baxtar was chosin and suorne cunnaris to pas' with
Alexander' allane seriande of the samyn quartar for this yer'
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xxvjo die Januarij Anno quo supra

The samyne daj Jhone abbot wes conuict' be ane assise Robert blinseil for
spekar for the wranguse Intromettinge witht vthir' mennys gudis that is to say witht
fowlis corne swyne and kaile / And to amend' as law will and forbeir In tyme tocum

the samyn day philp was conuikit be ane assise for the bying' and forstalling of aplis
vnyonis and vthir gudis or thai come to the key within the wattir for the custumis
was pait and to Amende as law wile and to forber in tyme to cum

The samyn day aly birs' mege stile hir douchtir canny Waus and eby
elysone was conuict' be ane assise for forstalling' and bying' of aplis
vnyonis' and vthir gudis or of the smale customys was pait and fra vnfremen
and to Amend as law wile and to forbeir in tyme to cum

The samyn day it was statute ande ordanit be the ballieis ande diuers' of the
consaile at the hukstaris sal by na gudis aplis vnyonis' feggis rasynnis
nor vthir gudis vnto the tyme thai cum to the key and the smale custumis be
pait and fra nay vnfremene vndir the pane of eschet tharof
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio tercio die februarij anno quosupra

the samyn day it was statut and ordanit be the ballieis ande consale witht
consent of the baxtaris that thai sal bak nay fourpenny bredis nor' bannokis
nor sele nayne vteuthe the towne on the nicht vndir the payne of eschet and
ane vnlaw of the court vnforgevin'

the samyn day the ballieis with avys' of the courte assignit this day xv dais
to mastir James Innes to comper befor thame and to warne the parsone of vne
to the samyn day to her ande se ane declaracion of the arrestment maid
one the behalf of the said parsone in the handis of Androu Wentone of xlv merkis
on the name of Alexander Rolland quethir the said arrestment be of vaile or nocht
And' tha ordanit Androw Wentone to haue his money reddy the said
day to mak pament of the Somez' bigan eftir the tenor of his oblicacion

the said day thome Rolland clamyt be Androu Wentone to freith' him
of xlv markis eftir the tenor of his obligacion allegit that he hed nay gudis
bot his land and the ballieis chargit the said thomas to demayn' his lande
as law wile and freith' the said Androu of the said Some

the samyn day mastir James Innes protestit solempnitlie for his costis skathis
and expensis maid ande sustenit on the persewing' of the money aucht to him
be Androw Wentone

The samyn day it was deliuerit be ane assise be the moutht of Alexander chamer
forspekar that Williame of gareache eldar sal deliuer to my lady of huntlie
ane pipe of quhit wyne quhilk was lade in his schip and thai fande
the aventour passit quhilk the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The samyne day it was statut and ordanit be the haile consale that ale the baxtaris
sal baik twenty vnce of weilbakin brede for ij d' and tene vnce for j d'
And quhilk of thame that bakis nocht this parte to serue the towne salbe
excludit the craft for yer' ande day Ande thar sal nay aylbe broyn'
nor' sauld derar' thane xij d' the gallone vndir' the payne of law quhilk
the ballieis sale execut with Rigouris the quhet being' sauld' for xviij s'

the samyn day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais to Androu Wentone to
ansuer to Androu branche as day of peremptour for vi l' of Siluer contenit in the
saide Androuis obligacion maid to the said Androw branche tharapon' and to mak
him pament eftir the tenor of the samyn

The samyn day Syme of gardin grantit him avand to Sandy prat xx s' of
Siluer the quhilk the ballieis chargit him to pay within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio sexto die februarij anno quo supra

The samyne day ale the baxtaris except' patrik clerk was conuikit be ane
assise Alexander chamer forspekar that thai did nocht to thar craft that thai awcht
to haue done sene the last tuysday for the quhlik Ilkan of thaim ar' in Amerciament
of the court And' atour it was ordanit and statut be the consale that ale the
baxtaris sal haue bred agan the next sonday to serue the tone and quhay has nocht
to be secludit the craft for yer and day ande sa furtht to continew to serue the tone
apone the quhilkis Androu branche the bailye tuk ane instrument

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos septimo die februarij
anno quo supra

the samyn day it was fundin and lauchfullie previt that Wile
blicht eldar flessar' is avande to Donald thomsone duelland in coklaw xxxix
s' and viii d' of Siluer for wederis quhilk he suld haue pait him one Sanct
Nicholes' day bigan be the fatht of his bodie and Wile blicht yongar his brodir
was borghe for the pament of the said Siluer quhilk he grantit in Jugement
And the officiar at commavnd of the balyeis chargit the said William yongar'
to pay the said siluer or mak it be pait within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos ixo die februarij Anno quo supra

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assise Alexander chamer forspekar
that Alexander Rolland the tollar sal pay to Richerd hile xx s' or he pas' out
of the tolbutht

the samyn day it was comperit Richerd of culane befor the aldirman and balyeis
and offerit him redy to abide and vndirly the ordinance and commavnd of tham as law
wile anent the pament of fiwe pundis gret aucht to Williame Abirdour

The samyn day Jonhne portar come souerte be his hande and gude to cristy prat
to keipe Androu lousone and sandy prat skathles of xl s' pait be the saide
cristy prat to Williame philp for cristy quhit and Androw brynne And Will
philp come souerte be his hand and gude to fre and releyf the said Jonhne'
portar tharanent

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' that gif euire Sandy
lammyntone kelour dispersonis or defamys one officiar in tyme to cum and
beis conuikit he salbe put in the goif iij houris and secludit and expellit
out of the toune for ane yer' thareftir

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos decimo die Ja februarij
anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Johannes Waus
est legittimus et propinquor heres quondam gilberti Waus patris sui

head.add: continuacio peticionis et clamei Johannis fechat

div.p:
Eodem die clameum et peticio Johannis Waus filij et heredis quondam
gilberti Waus de et super bonis Jure hereditario clamatis ac piscaria
dimidii Rethis de Raik calumpniat' continuatur vsque in diem lune ad dies
in similibus forma et effectu prout pro presenti sub spem aduentus Johannis fechat

Eodem die Dauid atkin filius quondam Andree atkin elegit fecit
constituit creauit et nominauit Walterum atkin suum fratrem germanum suum verum
legittimum et Indubitatum Curatum ad regendum et gubernandum se et bona sua ut de
cet curatum de Jure dummodo peruenerit ad perfectam etatem cum omnibus clausulis
ad huiusmodi officium curatorij necessariis et oportunis et cetera et inde peciit Instrumentum
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xiij die februarij anno quo supra

the quhilk day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' mastir Androw cadiow
forspekar that William gareache eldar is quyt of ane borghe strekit apon
him be Androu murray eldar for the refundin of his skatht anent
the weting' of ane sak of woll lade in the schip callit nicholes' of abirdene
becaus' it was fundin that the said William was nay mastir of the said
schip that tyme for alexander makeson' was mastir outwartis of the samyn schip
to quhome the saide Androw has his clame and action anent the witing'
of the said sek

the samyne day the aldirman ande ballieis with avys' of the haile
court ande consent and biding of Arthour forbes of Reres' one that
ane parte Ande Dauid galichtlie one that vthir parte assignit monunday
cum xv dais to the said Dauid to ansuer peremptourlie but ony langar delay
to ane borghe strekit be the saide arthour apon' the saide Dauid for the wrang
wys' avay taking' and withhaldin fra him of iiijor chaldir of corne with the mair
And gif the said Dauid comperis nocht the forsaide day he sale tyne his action'
to the quhilkis he grantit

Eodem die Johannes Waus filius et heres quondam gilberti Waus fecit constituit creauit
et nominauit Johannem Waus fratrem domini de many suum legittime procuratorem ad prosequendum
piscariam dimidij rethis de Raik et omnia bona sibi Jure hereditario contingen' et alias
petend' exigend' et recipiend' et terras suas assedand' et de receptis acquitand'
calumpniand' defendend' et prosequend' coram quocumque Judice competen' in vberiore
forma procuratorij promittens de Rato et grato et cetera

the samyn day Alexander rollande grantit him avand to Jonhne Waus gilbertis sone
xliij s' iiij d' of Siluer the quhilk the ballieis chargit him to
pay within terme of law
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvi die februarij Anno quo supra

the quhilk day it was deliuerit be the aldirman and the haile consale
that Jonhne of hile sal haue sic Regres' to his lande liand in the grene
to dispone frelie tharapone as he thinkis mast expedient And salbe quyt
ande fre of al clame and richt and barnispart and ale vthir gudis clamyt
or that may be clamyt apone him be margaret hile his douchtir in tyme to
cum the quhilk lande with the pertinentis scho resignit purlie and simpilie in the handis
Androw cullane ane of the ballieis for the saide burghe' in plane courte
And' atour scho renuncit al richt and clame that scho hed tile ony gudis
that scho mycht recouer vpone hir saide fadir And the said margaret sale haf
yerlie Induring ale the dais of hir fadir lywe dais ane boll of victale
at Witsonday and martymes in winter be evinly porcionis And to begin at the
next Witsonday in Abirdene for the pament of the quhilkis boll of victale yerlie
induring' the saide Jonhne of hill' lywe to be pait in Abirdene to the said margaret
as said is Androw Wentone is becumin dettour be his hande to vndirly this deliuerance
batht the said partiis was oblist be the h fathtis of ther' bodiis

The samyn day the Aldirman ande ballieis ordanit and chargit Androw Wentone
to content ande paye to Androw branche sex pundis contenit in his obligacione
this day xv dais to the pament of the quhilk the saide Androw Wentoune
assentit in penny and pennyworthtis

The samyn day Syme gardin oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to pay and content
to Androu murray eldar thre pundis and tene s' vsual money of Scotlande
for the annuell of his lande at Witsonday next to cum but fraud or gile
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvii die februarij Anno quosupra

the samyne day the aldirman and ballieis with avys' of the haile court decernit the
copy of the procuratory producit befor thame be mastir Androu cadiow for mastir
James Innes to the parsone of oyne and to Ansuer to the action' debatabile betuix tham
this day xv dais as law wile

the samyn day Alexander tailyour be his avne tongue gravnt was in Amerciament of the
courte for the distrubulance ande dispersoning of Richerd hile the fadir in word
to Amende as law wile and to forbeir in tyme to cum

the samyn day mastir Androw cadiow as procuratour to mastir James Innes askit the arrest
of xlv markis maid in Androu Wentonnis hande to be lousit and offerit him redy to
fynd caucion to do tharfor that law wile protestande thartatour for his expensis

the samyn day Richerd scot was conuikit be ane assise for the dispersoning
of thome Jamesone seriand in word and to Amdene amend' as law wile
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xviij die februarij Anno quo supra

Quo die Willelmus quhit inuenit magistrum Andream cadiow plegium legalem
quod Johannes grig et patricius grig erunt Indempnes et sua pars pro dicto Willelmo
sua parte adipiscend' adheren' aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes grig et
Patricius grig inuenerunt patricium rede plegium legalem quod dictus Willelmus
et pars sua erunt Indempnes pro se parte sua adipiscend' et adheren'
aliter quam per viam Juris et dictus Willelmus et thomas smolt se fide media
obligarunt ad conseruandum dictum magistrum Andream Indempnem de huiusmodi fideiussione
et similiter dicti patricius et Johannes se obligarunt ad conseruandum dictum patricium Indempnem
de huiusmodi fideiussione per ostensionem suarum manuum

the samyn day Arthur forbes of Reres' fande Robert ouchtirles' souerte to pay Wile
quhit sex merkis and demi at the next Witsonday for the frethin of Jonhne grig of
the Some promittit to the said William obefor And the said William grantit and oblist
him to tak William fraser of nev forest and Androw brynne or tua siclik men for the said Some
quhene euire the saide Arthour Requirit him tharto And this being' done the said Robert
is quyt of the saide borrougange And atour the saide arthour sale gyff to the said
Williame xx s' the quhilk he has assignit to mastir Androu cadiow
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio vicesimo die februarij anno quosupra

the quhilk day
Williame gareache yongar grantit him borghe to Androu forbes for ane stane and half
of woll for alexander nachty the quhilk the balieis chargit the said William to pay within
terme of law

the samyne day it was deliuerit be ane assis' Jonhne moire forspekar that Ranald
tailyour left ale the gudis that was in his butht and the formale of the samyn
butht for sex yeris as his assedacion proportis to the wyf of alexander traile
his douchtir
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio penultimo die februarij Anno quosupra

the samyn day the aldirman and ballieis with avis' of the court assignit monunday
cum xv dais to thome prat to Ansuer to ane borghe strekit apone him be Alexander
traile anent the lokin' of ane butht dur et cetera as the samyn borghe mair' fullie
proportis / as law wile And Jonhne Westland come souerte be his hand to the
ballieis for alexander traile to do to the saide thomas that he aw of law
Curia balliuorum tenta secundo die marcij Anno quo supra

the samyne day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' of thir personis
vndir writin that is to say Alexander chamer of murchile mastir Androu cadiow
thome prat Dauid matheson Jonhne menyeis mavnis Wormet Androw Wenton'
Williame cryne ande Jonhne portar quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aith' suorne
be the moutht of the saide Alexander chamer that Jonhne steuinsone his wyf thar landis
and gudis sal pay to William clerk duelland' at the kirk of glas' fiwe
markis vsual money of Scotland for malt resavit fra him the quhilk money
the ballieis chargit the said Jhone' steuinsonis wyf to pay withtin terme of law

the said day the wyf of Jonhne steuinson solempnitlie protestit quhatsumeuire thing
was done in the said actione anent the fiwe markis persevit be the said William
clerk suld turne hir nor hir husband to nay preiudice considerand' scho was
nocht procuratour for hir spous' as scho allegit
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio tercio die marcij Anno quo supra

the samyn day the parsone of oyne askit at the ballieis ane day to be
assignit to him and he suld bring sufficient previs befor thame the forsaid
day and preif that the lande liande in the gallougate betuix the landis of vmquhile
Androw moir one the northt parte and the lande of vmquhile Jonhne mathouson one the
southt part pertening to Alexander rolland his cister sone and al the malis and profitis that come or
micht cum tharof onywis' in tyme to cum was assignit to him for his burding' cle
thing' and vphalding' or euir he maid ony contrake with thome Rolland or mastir
James Innes or with ony vthiris anent the said lande or ony profitis that mycht cum tharof
protestand' the arrestment maide in the handis of Androu Wentone of xlv markis
obefor be nocht lousit to the tyme he may produce his said previs And' thareftir
the ballieis witht avys' ande deliuerance of the consale assignit Wednisday
cum Ane monetht to the parsone of oyne to bring' his previs befor tham to pref
his forsaide allegeance And' warnit and chargit mastir Androw cadiow procuratour
to mastir James Innes being' present for the tyme to comper befor thaim the said day
to se the saide previs suorne and to obiek agan thame as law wile

the samyn day comperit Williame Wormet befor the ballieis ande offerit him redy
to vndirly the law anent ony thingis that Robert of buchane hed to say to him
And Wille buchan sone to the said Robert said he was nocht planteous' apone the
saide Williame and he na thing' to say to him

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander rede forspekar that
henry bawne sal pay to Alexander chamer eldar xx s' within terme of law

the samyn day it was fundin and deliuerit be the said assis' Alexander rede forspekar
that Alexander chavmer of murchile sal gif vi s' and iiij d' to cristy prat and he sale
gif to alexander gray ane franche crovne
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio per balliuos sexto die marcij anno quo supra

the quhilk day comperit Williame abirdour befor the ballieis sittand in Juge
ment and allegit that the said day was assignit to him to comper befor thame
to haue hede pament of Richerd of cullane of tene v li' g' and xvij s' of siluer
optenit vp'him obefor offering' him redy to resaue his pament and to do and vndirly
Justice befor the saide ballieis nocht withstanding at the request of the ballieis
the said William grantit him content to continew the said action' quhilk monun
day cum aucht dais and thai chargit the four officiaris to pas' and warne the
saide Richerd to comper befor thame the saide day to mak pament of the saide
money to the said William as law wile eftir the tenor of the akis maid obefor
considerand he was chargit be the balyeis to haue remanit in the tolbutht
quhile he hed pait the said fiwe li' g'

the said day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to thome gledstane to comper
and ansuer to ane borghe strekit apone him for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xx s'
